experiences.description: Leading development of cloud-native applications and microservices architecture. Mentoring junior developers and driving technical decisions for the product team.
achievements: Led migration of monolithic application to microservices, improving scalability by 300%
Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes through CI/CD optimization
Mentored 5 junior developers, with 3 receiving promotions within 18 months
Architected real-time data pipeline processing 10M+ events daily
Implemented caching strategy that reduced database load by 60%

experiences.description: Built and maintained multiple customer-facing applications from scratch. Worked closely with product and design teams in an agile environment.
achievements: Built MVP that secured $2M seed funding
Developed real-time collaboration features serving 10K+ daily active users
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Implemented A/B testing framework that increased conversion by 25%

experiences.description: Developed responsive web applications for various clients across industries including e-commerce, healthcare, and finance.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Established component library reducing development time by 30%

experiences.description: Contributed to research projects and developed internal tools for the computer science department.
